thread.title: Brian Hoyer gets starting QB job back for scuffling Texans

title: Brian Hoyer gets starting QB job back for scuffling Texans
text:
> Florida Brian Hoyer gets starting QB job back for scuffling Texans Houston Texans' Ryan Mallett (15) throws against the Indianapolis Colts during the first half of an NFL football game Thursday, Oct. 8, 2015, in Houston.
